Subjects: James the Great, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. James the Great in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
of þe appostil syne sanct IameI wil tell þat had
                    thrynfold nam…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…þat we al to god sic ma beþat we ma part haf of
                    þat gle
